About Exit time: altim: lat: lon: azimuth: Go to go to coordinate geocoding width color export import Gps data list Settings merge selected logs Properties for: Chart zoom to Delete Properties for: Zoom to the map Delete the map Gps preferences Min gps logging distance Min gps logging interval Use at android level (saves battery, needs restart) If checked, the gps preferences are applied at operating system level, which can save battery, but might have a less stable signal when choosing large intervals (if you have gps connection problems on check devices, leave this unchecked). Note that the gps os powered continuously for send intervals less than 100 seconds. For better battery life choose larger intervals.
